introduction.title: 2023 NYCU TICA CUP－Real Escape Game
introduction.content:
Welcome to National Yang Ming Chiao Tung University! 
　
As outstanding award recipients of ICDF scholarship, we believe that you possess both exceptional intellectual and physical capabilities. In the following activities, we aim to provide you with the opportunity to experience the beauty of the mountains and forests right within the city, allowing you to explore and discover the unique culture of National Yang Ming Chiao Tung University without the need for traveling far into the mountaion. Let’s start!

prompts.title: Rules of Real Escape Game
prompts.alt:
Time：13:00 PM to 14:30 PM 
Venus：Yang Ming Campus 
 
Rules：
Each team is led by a captain who uses a mobile phone to scan QR codes or answer questions to collect points. The team with the highest score wins, with prizes awarded to the top three teams.

prompts.title: 任務說明
prompts.alt:
1、 「上下、左右」滑動：可獲取該關更多內容。
2、下方【輸入解答】按鈕：可看關卡題目、驗證答案。 
3、右下【燈泡】按鈕：可領取提示。
4、右上【菜單列】：可獲取關卡清單、遊戲狀態、聯絡客服等。

prompts.title: 關卡狀態說明
prompts.alt:
【已破關】關卡圖為清晰狀態
【已解鎖】關卡圖為模糊狀態
【未解鎖】關卡圖上有個鎖扣

prompts.title: 關卡選擇說明
prompts.alt:
🌟Please click the button below to choose the challenge areas🌟
——————————————————
There are a total of 'four major regions with 25 areas,'' and you can complete them 'in any order.'' You can refer to the game map for the locations of the four major regions, and plan your own route accordingly.

prompts.title: Bo-Ya Center
prompts.alt: Here is NYCU's Bo-Ya Center, which houses many important offices. From the picture of just a small corner of the iceberg, you will understand that the Bo-Ya Center used to be a cozy little haven.

answers.title: Kindergarten
answers.alt: The predecessor of the Bo-Ya Center was a kindergarten.

prompts.title: Bo-Ya Center
prompts.alt: Feeling a bit hungry after the walk? Why don't you take a look around to see what's special here? How about grabbing a cup of coffee and taking a break!

prompts.title: Outstanding Alumni
prompts.alt: Do you know who the current president of National Yang Ming Chiao Tung University is? He previously served as the Director of the Department of Health, Taipei City Government. Find a picture of the president and see where it is located.

answers.title: Dr. Chi-Hung Lin
answers.alt: President of National Yang Ming Chiao Tung University
